00032 /******************************************************************************
00033   Gets address of ZGP memory.
00034   Parameters: none.
00035   returns: Address of ZGP memory.
00036 ******************************************************************************/

00040 }
00041 /******************************************************************************
00042   Stores the pointer to the current request.
00043   Parameters:
00044     req - pointer to the current request.
00045   returns:
00046     none.
00047 ******************************************************************************/
00048 INLINE void zgpStoreReqParams(void *req)
00049 {
00050   zgpGetMem()->zgpReq = req;
00051 }
00052

00057   returns:
00058     Pointer to the current request.
00059 ******************************************************************************/
00060 INLINE void* zgpGetReqParams(void)
00061 {

00063 }
